mapper.select: SELECT (cast(t2.date AS DATE) = current_date) AS is_today, t2.section_name, t3.student_attendance_id, t3.lms_user_id, t2.date AS training_date, t3.training_start_time, t3.training_end_time, t3.status, t3.note, t3.blank_time FROM m_course t1 INNER JOIN m_section t2 ON t1.course_id = t2.course_id LEFT OUTER JOIN t_student_attendance t3 ON t3.lms_user_id = #{lmsUserId} AND cast(t2.date AS DATE) = cast(t3.training_date AS DATE) WHERE t1.course_id = #{courseId} AND t1.delete_flg = #{deleteFlg} ORDER BY t2.date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_student_attendance ( lms_user_id, training_date, training_start_time, training_end_time, status, note, account_id, delete_flg, first_create_user, first_create_date, last_modified_user, last_modified_date, blank_time ) VALUES ( #{lmsUserId}, #{trainingDate}, #{trainingStartTime}, #{trainingEndTime}, #{status}, #{note}, #{accountId}, #{deleteFlg}, #{firstCreateUser}, #{firstCreateDate}, #{lastModifiedUser}, #{lastModifiedDate}, #{blankTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_student_attendance SET training_start_time = #{trainingStartTime}, training_end_time = #{trainingEndTime}, status = #{status}, note = #{note}, last_modified_user = #{lastModifiedUser}, last_modified_date = #{lastModifiedDate}, blank_time = #{blankTime} WHERE student_attendance_id = #{studentAttendanceId}
